textos_fuente.text: About | The Riverfront Cocoa Beach Home Kayaking Tours Kayak Rentals Summer Camp Memberships Book Venue About Contact Gallery More Home Kayaking Tours Kayak Rentals Summer Camp Memberships Book Venue About Contact Gallery Home Kayaking Tours Kayak Rentals Summer Camp Memberships Book Venue About Contact Gallery About Us Nestled along the scenic Cocoa Beach riverfront The Riverfront Cocoa Beach offers breathtaking views of the Banana River. This picturesque location is the perfect backdrop for adventures and celebrations alike, making it a favored destination for both locals and visitors. Unforgettable kayaking and paddle boarding experience Enjoy our top-notch rentals and guided tours that let you explore the beautiful waters of Cocoa Beach like never before! Experience our exquisite venue Ideal for weddings, birthday parties, corporate events, and private gatherings. Nestled in a picturesque location, it’s the perfect backdrop for crafting unforgettable moments and lasting memories for you and your guests! Join our community by becoming a member! For just $50 per person with a minimum commitment of three months, you can enjoy exclusive access to events, special discounts on rentals, and much more. Come and experience everything The Riverfront has to offer! Learn more Instagram Reviews Upcoming Events 05/02/2025 FIRST FRIDAYS SUNSET BASH 6pm - 9pm 129 Manatee Lane, Cocoa Beach, FL Event Details 05/02/2025 FIRST FRIDAYS SUNSET BASH Join us for a sunset party every First Friday of the month. There will be food trucks, vendors, live entertainment and more! 6pm - 9pm 129 Manatee Lane, Cocoa Beach, FL 05/17/2025 RAW SURF'S 10 YEAR ANNIVERSARY PARTY 1pm - 5pm 129 Manatee Lane, Cocoa Beach, FL Event Details 05/17/2025 RAW SURF'S 10 YEAR ANNIVERSARY PARTY Raw Surf has rented out the venue to throw a public celebration for the 10 year anniversary of their brand! This is a ticketed event. 1pm - 5pm 129 Manatee Lane, Cocoa Beach, FL 05/31/2025 SIP N DIP HOSTED BY OMG EVENTS 2pm - 8pm 129 Manatee Lane, Cocoa Beach, FL Event Details 05/31/2025 SIP N DIP HOSTED BY OMG EVENTS OMG Events  is bringing back  Sip n Dip, the ultimate  pool party in Brevard County. This is a ticketed event that will sell out! 2pm - 8pm 129 Manatee Lane, Cocoa Beach, FL Our Partners Connect With Us Copyright © 2025 The Riverfront Cocoa Beach - All Rights Reserved. PRICE THIS VENUE Price this venue to get your estimate, no strings attached. PRICE THIS VENUE 1 / 8 Photo by :  Angel Gray Photography Report Riverfront Park 321-635-7702 CALL VENUE FAVORITE Venue highlights BYO Valet parking Venue details Style: Event Center, Ocean/Waterfront View Guest capacity: Accommodates up to 350 guests Services: Ceremony / Reception Outdoor VIEW OPTIONS Location: 401 Riveredge Boulevard Cocoa, FL 32922 Description: The City of Cocoa has facilities that are beautiful, one-of-a-kind locations for your special day. Weddings include setup and tear-down of tables and chairs for the inside facilities. This allows you to relax and enjoy your day. They offer vendor recommendations, a walk-through of the facility 30 days prior to your event, a Facility Attendant on site and a one-hour rehearsal time. Riverfront Park is an ideal location to tie the knot. Family and friends will witness your magical moment as you stand before a white wedding arbor, large palm trees and the blue river. Lush grass and large trees create an incredible backdrop for your wedding day photos. Afterwards, join your family and friends for a reception. Imagine tables of festive food under the white wedding tent. Guests will enjoy plenty of open space as they dine, dance and toast to your romance. Gather your family and friends at Riverfront Park for a memorable wedding celebration. READ MORE Additional details Service Options Venue notes The rental fee is $650 for a reception and ceremony and includes 12 hours of event time including set up and clean up time. The rental fee for a ceremony only wedding is $250. Amenities and Restrictions Amenities - Podium and/or stage - Venue set up and clean up - No kitchen - Public parking Restrictions - BYO alcohol - No rice, birdseed, confetti, etc. - Approved outside caterer allowed - Amplified music OK indoors and outdoors - Smoking in designated areas only - Alcohol must be served by licensed bartender/caterer - Music must end by 10:30PM Amenities - Podium and/or stage - Venue set up and clean up - No kitchen - Public parking Restrictions - BYO alcohol - No rice, birdseed, confetti, etc. - Approved outside caterer allowed - Amplified music OK indoors and outdoors - Smoking in designated areas only - Alcohol must be served by licensed bartender/caterer - Music must end by 10:30PM Links Riverfront Park 321-635-7702 CALL VENUE FAVORITE Venue Highlights BYO Valet parking STARTING AT $3,007 FOR 50 GUESTS Price this venue to get your customized estimate, no strings attached PRICE THIS VENUE Interested in this venue? Downtown Cocoa Village - Visit Space Coast Skip to main content Item Added to Itinerary My Planner Share My Itinerary Added to Wishlist Copied to Clipbord Surf Cams Map Local Weather Explore Fall is for Foodies Kennedy Space Center Visitor Complex Port Canaveral Wildlife Viewing Cocoa Beach Brevard Zoo Things To Do Sea Turtle Season Attractions Beaches Communities Restaurants Tours Museums Stay Bed and Breakfast Campgrounds Hotels Vacation Rentals Events Blogs Launches My Itinerary Visitor Information Vacation Planner Accessibility on the Space Coast Beach Safety Transportation and Map Search for: Search Follow Us on Social Media facebook-f instagram youtube pinterest-p Search for: Search Home Things to Do Downtown Cocoa Village Add to Wishlist Downtown Cocoa Village Downtown Cocoa Village has something for everyone with its blend of historic and modern times. On the modern end, Cocoa Village aims to please with a wide range of dining and entertainment venues, shopping, including an antique mall, art galleries, painting classes and cooking classes. Be sure to stroll through Cocoa Riverfront Park that features an outdoor amphitheatre, a playground, and a ‘splash and sprinkle’ area where both kids and adults cool off on a warm day all while watching the boats make their way along the Indian River. Cocoa Village also hosts and features many festivals and events throughout the year. With its rich 150 year history, the path through Downtown Cocoa Village highlights historic sites and buildings including the Parrish Grove Inn, Porcher House, Sur Le Parc, St. Mark’s Church, Hindle building, Derby Street Chapel, S.F. Travis Company, Masonic Temple Building, Blair building, Brevard County State Bank, and Cocoa Village Playhouse. A walking tour is available for a true historic experience.
